CURRICULUM VITAE 
PERSONAL DETAILS 
•
Name: Bùi Đình Đàn 
•
Nationality: Viet Nam 
•
Date of Birth: 05-03-1989 
•
Sex: Male 
•
Email: buidan.infotech@gmail.com                  
•
Address:  27B, 187/3 Phan Trong Tue Ward, Thanh Tri District, Ha Noi  
•
Mobile:  038 280 4344 
EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND 
•
8/2012 - Graduated with excellent level at Faculty of Information Technology, Ho Chi Minh City 
University of Transport 
•
Repeatedly got scholarship in the academic years at the University 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
•
Over 10 years experience in web development and management. 
•
Experience in manage team around 5 - 12 members. 
•
Good communication in both English and Vietnamese. 
•
Experience in providing solution and architectural blueprints to team from requirements. 
•
Experience with web management tools: mockups, project managements. 
•
Practical experience building micro-service system 
•
Practical experience with CI/CD  
•
Great practical experience with cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure) 
•
Experience with big data and big traffic system. 
•
Practical experience with containers (Docker, Kubernetes, ...) 
•
Practical experience in review code of team members and make comment to improve quality. 
•
Solid knowledge of end-to-end web development using PHP, OOP and MVC architecture and 
MySQL, NoSQL.  
•
Experience with service-oriented backend architectures (SOA) 
•
Experience with almost Php frameworks (Laravel, Yii, Ci, Cakephp, Zend, Phalcon, Kohana…) 
•
Practical experience with Nodejs, websocket, WebRTC 
•
Practical experience with TDD, Unit Test 
•
Experience with Linux administration 
•
NoSql Expert such as (Mongodb, Redis, Couchbase) 
•
Practical experience building api using Restful web service or SOAP 
•
Experience working with payment, banking system. 
•
Practical experience with searching technology such as Elasticsearch, sphinx. 
•
Experience with agile software development methodologies like Scrum, Kanban 
•
Database design and optimize mysql sql queries to improve performance  
•
Source control systems such as SVN, CVS, GIT 
•
Client and server-side performance optimisation techniques 
•
Solid knowledge of standards-based, accessible, cross-browser web development 
•
E-commerce / Payment Gateway integration 
•
Experience of development throughout the product life cycle from a performance point of view 
•
Front-end basic skills 
•
Writing clear documentation 
•
Good understand about other languages like Java, C#, C++, Golang 
•
Good understand about Android/iOS applications 
•
Fast in troubleshooting/Bug fixing 
•
Willing to explore and learn new things and a good attitude 
WORKING HISTORY 
•
05/2010 - 05/2012: 
Company: Netbiz 
Position: Php Developer 
Netbiz is a company working in the outsourcing field. Consulting and implementation of systems for 
customers from the US, Europe, Australia, Singapore, Japan ... 
•
05/2012 - 09/2013:  
Company: VATGIA.COM  
Position: Team leader 
Vatgia's top e-commerce system at that time.  
•
09/2013 - 10/2016: 
Company: HOCMAI.VN 
            Position: Head of the R&D department 
            HOCMAI is the leading enterprise sales in online education segment in Vietnam. 
•
10/2016 - 6/2017: 
Company: OnOnPay 
            Position: Technical Leader 
            Ononpay is payment service application, provide an easy way to recharge, transfer money. 
•
6/2017 - Now: 
 Company: HOTTAB 
            Position: Technical Leader 
            HOTTAB is focusing on F&B market. HOTTAB provide POS system with fully feature and reporting 
real time. Beside that it also provide an online order platform for restaurants. 
PROJECTS 
•
Moneypenny - https://moneypenny.me  
Scope of project (Team Size: 8, time: 6 months) 
Role: Php Developer  
Technologies: Yii framework, jQuery, QueryUI, Payment Gateway Integration (Paypal,  Stripe) 
     Description:  
It is a combination of online accounting software for small and medium sized enterprises. 
Including online billing, project time tracking, storing customer information, online payment 
support. 
•
Network of free credit broker loans in the UK, US, AUS 
Scope of project (Team Size: 4, time: 2 years) 
Role: Php Developer  
Technologies: Yii2, Restful Web-service, Soap Web-service, Third party Api integration, Jquery  
Including pages: 
http://www.heartpaydays.com 
http://www.vivaloans.co.uk 
http://www.southfinance.co.uk 
http://www.loansumo.com 
http://www.vivapaydayloans.com.au 
http://www.bluesealoans.co.uk 
http://www.pinkyloans.com 
http://www.junglefinance.com 
http://www.verymerryloans.com 
http://www.prontopaydays.com 
http://www.cosmicloans.co.uk 
http://www.wisecarfinance.co.uk 
http://www.loankite.co.uk 
http://www.instantaneocredito.es 
http://www.fieryloans.co.uk 
Description : 
      They are a series of websites for short-term loans in the UK. All user requests are handled by 
one server and when receive a request the API has to find suitable sites to give loans and move 
user to the site. Database systems with extremely large amounts. 
Wearshare - http://wearshare.us/ 
Scope of project (Team Size: 2, time: 6 months) 
Role: Php Developer  
Technologies: CodeIgniter, Facebook APIs,  Instagram APIs, Jquery, Back-ground process. 
Description: 
It is a website dedicated to taking pictures from a user's Facebook and Instagram combined with 
the availability of user photos, which use technology to help users to edit their photos and then 
combine them with together to create beautiful bracelets to share for everyone or for sale. 
Chickisslove - http://chickisslove.com/ 
Scope of project (Team Size: 3, time: 8 months) 
Role: Php Developer  
Technologies: CodeIgniter, MongoDb, Jquery. 
Description: 
An e-commerce project in the two markets are Malaysia and Singapore. 
Leemarine - http://www.leemarine.com 
Scope of project (Team Size: 3, time: 8 months) 
•
•
•
Role: Php Developer  
Technologies: CodeIgniter, Jquery. 
Description: 
The website dedicated to the promotion, sale of vessels.  
Loveoffice  - http://loveoffice.vn (Business Social Network) 
Scope of project (Team Size: 8, time: 2 years) 
Role: Senior PHP Developer  
Technologies: Yii, Jquery, NodeJS, MongoDb, Couchbase, Memcached 
Description : 
LoveOffice is a social network for the enterprise, helps managers can convey an idea, a direction 
to all staff quickly and efficiently. Help for internal communications, a company constantly go up 
and build company culture stronger. 
LoveOffice is a major project in both size and technology, however, are unfortunately it was not 
really successful in Vietnam. After a test run time in Vietnam failed, VNT has decided to stop 
providing services and switch to a different direction. 
Nhanh http://nhanh.vn (Logistics system) 
Scope of project (Team Size: 10, time: 2 years) 
Role: Senior PHP Developer 
Technologies: Zend, Jquery, Memcached  
Description: 
Rapid logistics system for the pricing of such sites: 
http://cucre.vn, http: //siki.vn,http: //iki.vn 
In additional it is a product of warehouse management software available, with the ability to 
measure the amount of survival time, real-time transactions. Express really is a useful tool for 
companies that want to manage the size and logistics, money clearly. 
Hocmai - hocmai.vn and Apps  
Scope of project (Team Size: 5, time: 2 years) 
Role: Technical Lead  
Technologies: Phalcon, Moodle, Jquery, Memcached, Video Streaming , Sphinx 
Speakup.vn 
Project name: Speakup 
Scope of project (Team Size: 4, time: 1 year) 
Role: Technical Lead  
      Technologies: Yii, Redis, WebRTC, NodeJS, Jquery, Memcached, HTML5  
     Speakup.vn is a platform for online teaching. It allows teacher and students interactive together         
     via video conference, audio and white-board, where you can draw many objects or upload  
     document. 
ONONPAY System ( Web, Apps) 
Project name: ONONPAY

Role: Technical Lead   
Technologies: Laravel, Memcached, Payment integration, Restful API

HOTTAB System ( Web, Apps) 
Project name: HOTTAB 
Scope of project (Team Size: 10, time: 3 year) 
Role: Technical Lead   
Technologies: Laravel, NodeJS, Memcached, Docker, Elasticsearch, Google Data Store, Micro 
services.
